description:
Huey and Dalian go on a wild goose chase when they realize Camilla has obtained a Phantom Book that can exchange items of equal value. Then, Armand pleads for help with more relationship problems that are growing worse by the minute.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Book of Equivalence / Book of Relationship
Le livre de l`équivalence / Le livre de l`union
Livro Da Equivalência! - Livro Do Relacionamento!
Touka no Sho / Renri no Sho
等価の書 / 連理の書
